_description: William Dunbar (attrib.), On the resurrection — five 8-line stanzas with refrain, ‘Surrexit sicut dixit allalue’

Banna.First Lines:
Surrexit Dominus de sepulchroThe lord is rissin fra deid to lyfe
                    agane…
Banna.Last Lines:
…He deit triumphand he rais and wan þe feildSurrexit
                    sicut dixit allelua
